trans-unit.source: Represents a directory object in a virtual file or resource space.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un oggetto di directory in uno spazio virtuale per un file o una risorsa.

trans-unit.source: The VirtualDirectory class is the base class for objects that represent directories in a virtual file system.
trans-unit.target: La classe VirtualDirectory è la classe base per gli oggetti che rappresentano directory in un file system virtuale.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you would implement a descendent of the VirtualDirectory class for each <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider> class descendent in your Web application.
trans-unit.target: In genere, si implementa un discendente della classe VirtualDirectory per ogni <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider>classe discendente nell'applicazione Web.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the resource represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso virtuale alla risorsa rappresentata da questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the files and subdirectories contained in this virtual directory.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un elenco dei file e delle sottodirectory contenute in questa directory virtuale.

trans-unit.source: The Children property contains both <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> and <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects that represent the files and directories contained in this virtual directory.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di elementi figlio contiene sia <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>e <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>gli oggetti che rappresentano i file e directory contenute in questa directory virtuale.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: To return only the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire solo il <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: To return only the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire solo il <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interfaccia contenente <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"> </xref> oggetti.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of all the subdirectories contained in this directory.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un elenco di tutte le sottodirectory contenute in questa directory.

trans-unit.source: The Directories property contains <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects that represent the directories contained in this virtual directory.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di directory contiene <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>gli oggetti che rappresentano le directory contenute in questa directory virtuale.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>

trans-unit.source: To return the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire il <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: To return both <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> and <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire entrambi <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>e <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interfaccia contenente <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"> </xref> oggetti.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of all files contained in this directory.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un elenco di tutti i file contenuti in questa directory.

trans-unit.source: The Files property contains <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> objects that represent the files contained in this virtual directory.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di file contiene <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>gli oggetti che rappresentano i file contenuti in questa directory virtuale.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: To return the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire il <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>

trans-unit.source: To return both <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> and <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire entrambi <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>e <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interfaccia contenente <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile"> </xref> oggetti.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates that this is a virtual resource that should be treated as a directory.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica che si tratta di una risorsa virtuale che deve essere considerata come una directory.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
